title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Trouble for Benn, Kambosos-Haney, and Wilder, HOF?
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Trouble for Benn, Kambosos-Haney, and Wilder, HOF?
description:
This week Chris sits down with Boxing Scene's, Keith Idec to break down the latest for Conor Benn, the Status of Crawford-Spence, and if Deontay Wilder should be in the Hall of Fame. Later, Caleb Plant joins Chris to talk about the drama surrounding his upcoming fight. #Volume #Herd #ColinCowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
